Colin Powell on Barack Obama , unemployment and the State of the Union speech Speaking about Barack Obama 's international diplomacy, Colin Powell continued, I think he has reached out to countries around the world and has developed good relations with countries around the world. And I think he's working very hard on the issue of unemployment which I think is the major problem facing America right now, and I think and I hope that this will be the centerpiece of the State of the Union speech.
